spell.name: Resistance
spell.desc: Subject gains +1 on saving throws.

spell.name: Ray of Frost
spell.desc: Ray deals 1d3 cold damage.

spell.name: Detect Poison
spell.desc: Detects poison in one creature or small object.

spell.name: Daze
spell.desc: Creature loses next action.

spell.name: Flare
spell.desc: Dazzles one creature (-1 attack).

spell.name: Light
spell.desc: Object shines like a torch.

spell.name: Dancing Lights
spell.desc: Figment torches or other lights.

spell.name: Ghost Sound
spell.desc: Figment sounds.

spell.name: Disrupt Undead
spell.desc: Deals 1d6 damage to one undead.

spell.name: Mage Hand
spell.desc: 5-pound telekinesis.

spell.name: Mending
spell.desc: Makes minor repairs on an object.

spell.name: Open/Close
spell.desc: Opens or closes small or light things.

spell.name: Arcane Mark
spell.desc: Inscribes a personal rune (visible or invisible).

spell.name: Detect Magic
spell.desc: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft.

spell.name: Prestidigitation
spell.desc: Performs minor tricks.

spell.name: Read Magic
spell.desc: Read scrolls and spellbooks.

spell.name: Alarm
spell.desc: Wards an area for 2 hours/level.

spell.name: Endure Elements
spell.desc: Ignores 5 damage/round from one energy type.

spell.name: Hold Portal
spell.desc: Holds door shut.

spell.name: Protection from Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
spell.desc: +2 AC and saves, counter mind control, hedge out elementals and outsiders.

spell.name: Shield
spell.desc: Invisible disc gives cover and blocks magic missiles.

spell.name: Grease
spell.desc: Makes 10-ft. square or one object slippery.

spell.name: Mage Armor
spell.desc: Gives subject +4 armor bonus.

spell.name: Mount
spell.desc: Summons riding horse for 2 hr./level.

spell.name: Obscuring Mist
spell.desc: Fog surrounds you.

spell.name: Summon Monster I
spell.desc: Calls outsider to fight for you.

spell.name: Unseen Servant
spell.desc: Creates invisible force that obeys your commands.

spell.name: Comprehend Languages
spell.desc: Understands all spoken and written languages.

spell.name: Detect Secret Doors
spell.desc: Reveals hidden doors within 60 ft.

spell.name: Detect Undead
spell.desc: Reveals undead within 60 ft.

spell.name: Identify
spell.desc: Determines single feature of magic item.

spell.name: True Strike
spell.desc: Adds +20 bonus to your next attack roll.

spell.name: Charm Person
spell.desc: Makes one person your friend.

spell.name: Hypnotism
spell.desc: Fascinates 2d4 HD of creatures.

spell.name: Sleep
spell.desc: Put 2d4 HD of creatures into comatose slumber.

spell.name: Magic Missile
spell.desc: 1d4+1 damage; +1 missile/two levels above 1st (max +5).

spell.name: Tensers Floating Disk
spell.desc: 3-ft.-diameter horizontal disk that holds 100 lb./level.

spell.name: Change Self
spell.desc: Changes your appearance.

spell.name: Color Spray
spell.desc: Knocks unconscious, blinds, or stuns 1d6 weak creatures.

spell.name: Nystuls Magical Aura
spell.desc: Grants object false magic aura.

spell.name: Nystuls Undetectable Aura
spell.desc: Masks magic items aura.

spell.name: Silent Image
spell.desc: Creates minor illusion of your design.

spell.name: Ventriloquism
spell.desc: Throws voice for 1 min./level.

spell.name: Cause Fear
spell.desc: One creature flees for 1d4 rounds.

spell.name: Chill Touch
spell.desc: 1 touch/level deals 1d6 damage and possibly 1 Str damage.

spell.name: Ray of Enfeeblement
spell.desc: Ray reduces Str by 1d6 points +1 point/two levels.

spell.name: Animate Rope
spell.desc: Makes a rope move at your command.

spell.name: Burning Hands
spell.desc: 1d4 fire damage/level (max: 5d4).

spell.name: Enlarge
spell.desc: Object or creature grows +10%/level (max +50%).

spell.name: Erase
spell.desc: Mundane or magical writing vanishes.

spell.name: Expeditious Retreat
spell.desc: Doubles your speed.

spell.name: Feather Fall
spell.desc: Objects or creatures fall slowly.

spell.name: Jump
spell.desc: Subject gets +30 on Jump checks.

spell.name: Magic Weapon
spell.desc: Weapon gains +1 bonus.

spell.name: Message
spell.desc: Whispered conversation at distance.

spell.name: Reduce
spell.desc: Object or creature shrinks 10%/level (max 50%).

spell.name: Shocking Grasp
spell.desc: Touch delivers 1d8 +1/level electricity.

spell.name: Spider Climb
spell.desc: Grants ability to walk on walls and ceilings.

spell.name: Arcane Lock
spell.desc: Magically locks a portal or chest.

spell.name: Obscure Object
spell.desc: Masks object against divination.

spell.name: Protection from Arrows
spell.desc: Subject immune to most ranged attacks.

spell.name: Resist Elements
spell.desc: Ignores 12 damage/round from one energy type.

spell.name: Fog Cloud
spell.desc: Fog obscures vision.

spell.name: Glitterdust
spell.desc: Blinds creatures, outlines invisible creatures.

spell.name: Melfs Acid Arrow
spell.desc: Ranged touch attack; 2d4 damage for 1 round + 1 round/three levels.

spell.name: Summon Monster II
spell.desc: Calls outsider to fight for you.

spell.name: Summon Swarm
spell.desc: Summons swarm of small crawling or flying creatures.

spell.name: Web
spell.desc: Fills 10-ft. cube/level with sticky spider webs.

spell.name: Detect Thoughts
spell.desc: Allows listening to surface thoughts.

spell.name: Locate Object
spell.desc: Senses direction toward object (specific or type).

spell.name: See Invisibility
spell.desc: Reveals invisible creatures or objects.

spell.name: Tashas Hideous Laughter
spell.desc: Subject loses actions for 1d3 rounds.

spell.name: Darkness
spell.desc: 20-ft. radius of supernatural darkness.

spell.name: Daylight
spell.desc: 60-ft. radius of bright light.

spell.name: Flaming Sphere
spell.desc: Rolling ball of fire, 2d6 damage, lasts 1 round/level.

spell.name: Shatter
spell.desc: Sonic vibration damages objects or crystalline creatures.

spell.name: Blur
spell.desc: Attacks miss subject 20% of the time.

spell.name: Continual Flame
spell.desc: Makes a permanent, heatless torch.

spell.name: Hypnotic Pattern
spell.desc: Fascinates 2d4+1 HD/level of creatures.

spell.name: Invisibility
spell.desc: Subject is invisible for 10 min./level or until it attacks.

spell.name: Leomunds Trap
spell.desc: Makes item seem trapped.

spell.name: Magic Mouth
spell.desc: Speaks once when triggered.

spell.name: Minor Image
spell.desc: As silent image, plus some sound.

spell.name: Mirror Image
spell.desc: Creates decoy duplicates of you (1d4 +1/three levels, max 8).

spell.name: Misdirection
spell.desc: Misleads divinations for one creature or object.

spell.name: Ghoul Touch
spell.desc: Paralyzes one subject, who exudes stench (-2 penalty) nearby.

spell.name: Scare
spell.desc: Panics creatures up to 5 HD (15-ft. radius).

spell.name: Spectral Hand
spell.desc: Creates disembodied glowing hand to deliver touch attacks.

spell.name: Alter Self
spell.desc: As change self, plus more drastic changes.

spell.name: Blindness/Deafness
spell.desc: Makes subject blind or deaf.

spell.name: Bulls Strength
spell.desc: Subject gains 1d4+1 Str for 1 hr./level.

spell.name: Cats Grace
spell.desc: Subject gains 1d4+1 Dex for 1 hr./level.

spell.name: Darkvision
spell.desc: See 60 ft. in total darkness.

spell.name: Endurance
spell.desc: Gain 1d4+1 Con for 1 hr./level.

spell.name: Knock
spell.desc: Opens locked or magically sealed door.

spell.name: Levitate
spell.desc: Subject moves up and down at your direction.

spell.name: Pyrotechnics
spell.desc: Turns fire into blinding light or choking smoke.

spell.name: Rope Trick
spell.desc: Up to eight creatures hide in extradimensional space.

spell.name: Whispering Wind
spell.desc: Sends a short message one mile/level.

spell.name: Dispel Magic
spell.desc: Cancels magical spells and effects.

spell.name: Explosive Runes
spell.desc: Deals 6d6 damage when read.

spell.name: Magic Circle against Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
spell.desc: As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.

spell.name: Nondetection
spell.desc: Hides subject from divination, scrying.

spell.name: Protection from Elements
spell.desc: Absorb 12 damage/level from one kind of energy.

spell.name: Flame Arrow
spell.desc: Shoots flaming projectiles (extra damage) or fiery bolts (4d6 damage).

spell.name: Phantom Steed
spell.desc: Magical horse appears for 1 hour/level.

spell.name: Sepia Snake Sigil
spell.desc: Creates text symbol that immobilizes reader.

spell.name: Sleet Storm
spell.desc: Hampers vision and movement.

spell.name: Stinking Cloud
spell.desc: Nauseating vapors, 1 round/level.

spell.name: Summon Monster III
spell.desc: Calls outsider to fight for you.

spell.name: Clairaudience/Clairvoyance
spell.desc: Hear or see at a distance for 1 min./level.

spell.name: Tongues
spell.desc: Speak any language.

spell.name: Hold Person
spell.desc: Holds one person helpless; 1 round/level.

spell.name: Suggestion
spell.desc: Compels subject to follow stated course of action.

spell.name: Fireball
spell.desc: 1d6 damage per level, 20-ft. radius.

spell.name: Gust of Wind
spell.desc: Blows away or knocks down smaller creatures.

spell.name: Leomunds Tiny Hut
spell.desc: Creates shelter for 10 creatures.

spell.name: Lightning Bolt
spell.desc: Electricity deals 1d6 damage/level.

spell.name: Wind Wall
spell.desc: Deflects arrows, smaller creatures, and gases.

spell.name: Displacement
spell.desc: Attacks miss subject 50%.

spell.name: Illusory Script
spell.desc: Only intended reader can decipher.

spell.name: Invisibility Sphere
spell.desc: Makes everyone within 10 ft. invisible.

spell.name: Major Image
spell.desc: As silent image, plus sound, smell and thermal effects.

spell.name: Gentle Repose
spell.desc: Preserves one corpse.

spell.name: Halt Undead
spell.desc: Immobilizes undead for 1 round/level.

spell.name: Vampiric Touch
spell.desc: Touch deals 1d6/two caster levels; caster gains damage as hp.

spell.name: Blink
spell.desc: You randomly vanish and reappear for 1 round/level.

spell.name: Fly
spell.desc: Subject flies at speed of 90.

spell.name: Gaseous Form
spell.desc: Subject becomes insubstantial and can fly slowly.

spell.name: Greater Magic Weapon
spell.desc: +1/three levels (max +5).

spell.name: Haste
spell.desc: Extra partial action and +4 AC.

spell.name: Keen Edge
spell.desc: Doubles normal weapons threat range.

spell.name: Secret Page
spell.desc: Changes one page to hide its real content.

spell.name: Shrink Item
spell.desc: Object shrinks to one-twelfth size.

spell.name: Slow
spell.desc: One subject/level takes only partial actions, -2 AC, -2 melee rolls.

spell.name: Water Breathing
spell.desc: Subjects can breathe underwater.

spell.name: Dimensional Anchor
spell.desc: Bars extradimensional movement.

spell.name: Fire Trap
spell.desc: Opened object deals 1d4 +1/level damage.

spell.name: Minor Globe of Invulnerability
spell.desc: Stops 1st- through 3rd-level spell effects.

spell.name: Remove Curse
spell.desc: Frees object or person from curse.

spell.name: Stoneskin
spell.desc: Stops blows, cuts, stabs, and slashes.

spell.name: Evards Black Tentacles
spell.desc: 1d4 +1/level tentacles grapple randomly within 15 ft.

spell.name: Leomunds Secure Shelter
spell.desc: Creates sturdy cottage.

spell.name: Minor Creation
spell.desc: Creates one cloth or wood object.

spell.name: Solid Fog
spell.desc: Blocks vision and slows movement.

spell.name: Summon Monster IV
spell.desc: Calls outsider to fight for you.

spell.name: Arcane Eye
spell.desc: Invisible floating eye moves 30 ft./round.

spell.name: Detect Scrying
spell.desc: Alerts you of magical eavesdropping.

spell.name: Locate Creature
spell.desc: Indicates direction to familiar creature.

spell.name: Scrying
spell.desc: Spies on subject from a distance.

spell.name: Charm Monster
spell.desc: Makes monster believe it is your ally.

spell.name: Confusion
spell.desc: Makes subject behave oddly for 1 round/level.

spell.name: Emotion
spell.desc: Arouses strong emotion in subject.

spell.name: Lesser Geas
spell.desc: Commands subject of 7 HD or less.

spell.name: Fire Shield
spell.desc: Creatures attacking you take fire damage; you are protected from heat or cold.

spell.name: Ice Storm
spell.desc: Hail deals 5d6 damage in cylinder 40 ft. across.

spell.name: Otilukes Resilient Sphere
spell.desc: Force globe protects but traps one subject.

spell.name: Shout
spell.desc: Deafens all within cone and deals 2d6 damage.

spell.name: Wall of Fire
spell.desc: Deals 2d4 fire damage out to 10 ft. and 1d4 out to 20 ft.

spell.name: Wall of Ice
spell.desc: Ice plane creates wall with 15 hp +1/level, or hemisphere can trap creatures inside.

spell.name: Hallucinatory Terrain
spell.desc: Makes one type of terrain appear like another (field into forest, etc).

spell.name: Illusory Wall
spell.desc: Wall, floor, or ceiling looks real, but anything can pass through.

spell.name: Improved Invisibility
spell.desc: As invisibility, but subject can attack and stay invisible.

spell.name: Phantasmal Killer
spell.desc: Fearsome illusion kills subject or deals 3d6 damage.

spell.name: Rainbow Pattern
spell.desc: Lights prevent 24 HD of creatures from attacking or moving away.

spell.name: Shadow Conjuration
spell.desc: Mimics conjuring below 4th level.

spell.name: Contagion
spell.desc: Infects subject with chosen disease.

spell.name: Enervation
spell.desc: Subject gains 1d4 negative levels.

spell.name: Fear
spell.desc: Subjects within cone flee for 1 round/level.

spell.name: Bestow Curse
spell.desc: -6 to an ability; -4 on attacks, saves, and checks; or 50% chance of losing each action.

spell.name: Dimension Door
spell.desc: Teleports you and up to 500 lb.

spell.name: Polymorph Other
spell.desc: Gives one subject a new form.

spell.name: Polymorph Self
spell.desc: You assume a new form.

spell.name: Rarys Mnemonic Enhancer
spell.desc: Prepares extra spells or retains one just cast. Wizard only.

spell.name: Dismissal
spell.desc: Forces a creature to return to native plane.

spell.name: Cloudkill
spell.desc: Kills 3 HD or less; 4-6 HD save or die.

spell.name: Leomunds Secret Chest
spell.desc: Hides expensive chest on Ethereal Plane; you retrieve it at will.

spell.name: Lesser Planar Binding
spell.desc: Traps outsider until it performs a task.

spell.name: Major Creation
spell.desc: As minor creation, plus stone and metal.

spell.name: Mordenkainens Faithful Hound
spell.desc: Phantom dog can guard, attack.

spell.name: Summon Monster V
spell.desc: Calls outsider to fight for you.

spell.name: Wall of Iron
spell.desc: 30 hp/four levels; can topple onto foes.

spell.name: Wall of Stone
spell.desc: 20 hp/four levels; can be shaped.

spell.name: Contact Other Plane
spell.desc: Ask question of extraplanar entity.

spell.name: Prying Eyes
spell.desc: 1d4 floating eyes +1/level scout for you.

spell.name: Rarys Telepathic Bond
spell.desc: Link lets allies communicate.

spell.name: Dominate Person
spell.desc: Controls humanoid telepathically.

spell.name: Feeblemind
spell.desc: Subjects Int drops to 1.

spell.name: Hold Monster
spell.desc: As hold person, but any creature.

spell.name: Mind Fog
spell.desc: Subjects in fog get -10 Wis, Will checks.

spell.name: Bigbys Interposing Hand
spell.desc: Hand provides 90% cover against one opponent.

spell.name: Cone of Cold
spell.desc: 1d6 cold damage/level.

spell.name: Sending
spell.desc: Delivers short message anywhere, instantly.

spell.name: Wall of Force
spell.desc: Wall is immune to damage.

spell.name: Dream
spell.desc: Sends message to anyone sleeping.

spell.name: False Vision
spell.desc: Fools scrying with an illusion.

spell.name: Greater Shadow Conjuration
spell.desc: As shadow conjuration, but up to 4th level and 40% real.

spell.name: Mirage Arcana
spell.desc: As hallucinatory terrain, plus structures.

spell.name: Nightmare
spell.desc: Sends vision dealing 1d10 damage, fatigue.

spell.name: Persistent Image
spell.desc: As major image, but no concentration required.

spell.name: Seeming
spell.desc: Changes appearance of one person/two levels.

spell.name: Shadow Evocation
spell.desc: Mimics evocation less than 5th level.

spell.name: Animate Dead
spell.desc: Creates undead skeletons and zombies.

spell.name: Magic Jar
spell.desc: Enables possession of another creature.

spell.name: Animal Growth
spell.desc: One animal/two levels doubles in size, HD.

spell.name: Fabricate
spell.desc: Transforms raw materials into finished items.

spell.name: Passwall
spell.desc: Breaches walls 1 ft. thick/level.

spell.name: Stone Shape
spell.desc: Sculpts stone into any form.

spell.name: Telekinesis
spell.desc: Lifts or moves 25 lb./level at long range.

spell.name: Teleport
spell.desc: Instantly transports you anywhere.

spell.name: Transmute Mud to Rock
spell.desc: Transforms two 10-ft. cubes/level.

spell.name: Transmute Rock to Mud
spell.desc: Transforms two 10-ft. cubes/level.

spell.name: Permanency
spell.desc: Makes certain spells permanent; costs XP.

spell.name: Antimagic Field
spell.desc: Negates magic within 10 ft.

spell.name: Globe of Invulnerability
spell.desc: As minor globe, plus 4th level.

spell.name: Greater Dispelling
spell.desc: As dispel magic, but +20 on check.

spell.name: Guards and Wards
spell.desc: Array of magic effects protect area.

spell.name: Repulsion
spell.desc: Creatures cant approach you.

spell.name: Acid Fog
spell.desc: Fog deals acid damage.

spell.name: Planar Binding
spell.desc: As lesser planar binding, but up to 16 HD.

spell.name: Summon Monster VI
spell.desc: Calls outsider to fight for you.

spell.name: Analyze Dweomer
spell.desc: Reveals magical aspects of subject.

spell.name: Legend Lore
spell.desc: Learn tales about a person, place, or thing.

spell.name: True Seeing
spell.desc: See all things as they really are.

spell.name: Geas/Quest
spell.desc: As lesser geas, plus it affects any creature.

spell.name: Mass Suggestion
spell.desc: As suggestion, plus one/level subjects.

spell.name: Bigbys Forceful Hand
spell.desc: Hand pushes creatures away.

spell.name: Chain Lightning
spell.desc: 1d6 damage/level; secondary bolts.

spell.name: Contingency
spell.desc: Sets trigger condition for another spell.

spell.name: Otilukes Freezing Sphere
spell.desc: Freezes water or deals cold damage.

spell.name: Greater Shadow Evocation
spell.desc: As shadow evocation, but up to 5th level.

spell.name: Mislead
spell.desc: Turns you invisible and creates illusory double.

spell.name: Permanent Image
spell.desc: Includes sight, sound, and smell.

spell.name: Programmed Image
spell.desc: As major image, plus triggered by event.

spell.name: Project Image
spell.desc: Illusory double can talk and cast spells.

spell.name: Shades
spell.desc: As shadow conjuration, but up to 5th level and 60% real.

spell.name: Veil
spell.desc: Changes appearance of group of creatures.

spell.name: Circle of Death
spell.desc: Kills 1d4 HD/level.

spell.name: Control Water
spell.desc: Raises, lowers, or parts bodies of water.

spell.name: Control Weather
spell.desc: Changes weather in local area.

spell.name: Disintegrate
spell.desc: Makes one creature or object vanish.

spell.name: Eyebite
spell.desc: Charm, fear, sicken or sleep one subject.

spell.name: Flesh to Stone
spell.desc: Turns subject creature into statue.

spell.name: Mass Haste
spell.desc: As haste, affects one/level subjects.

spell.name: Mordenkainens Lucubration
spell.desc: Recalls spell of 5th level or less. Wizard Only.

spell.name: Move Earth
spell.desc: Digs trenches and build hills.

spell.name: Stone to Flesh
spell.desc: Restores petrified creature.

spell.name: Tensers Transformation
spell.desc: You gain combat bonuses.

spell.name: Banishment
spell.desc: Banishes 2 HD/level extraplanar creatures.

spell.name: Sequester
spell.desc: Subject is invisible to sight and scrying.

spell.name: Spell Turning
spell.desc: Reflect 1d4+6 spell levels back at caster.

spell.name: Drawmijs Instant Summons
spell.desc: Prepared object appears in your hand.

spell.name: Mordenkainens Magnificent Mansion
spell.desc: Door leads to extradimensional mansion.

spell.name: Phase Door
spell.desc: Invisible passage through wood or stone.

spell.name: Power Word, Stun
spell.desc: Stuns creature with up to 150 hp.

spell.name: Summon Monster VII
spell.desc: Calls outsider to fight for you.

spell.name: Greater Scrying
spell.desc: As scrying, but faster and longer.

spell.name: Vision
spell.desc: As legend lore, but quicker and strenuous.

spell.name: Insanity
spell.desc: Subject suffers continuous confusion.

spell.name: Bigbys Grasping Hand
spell.desc: Hand provides cover, pushes, or grapples.

spell.name: Delayed Blast Fireball
spell.desc: 1d8 fire damage/level; you can delay blast for 5 rounds.

spell.name: Forcecage
spell.desc: Cube of force imprisons all inside.

spell.name: Mordenkainens Sword
spell.desc: Floating magic blade strikes opponents.

spell.name: Prismatic Spray
spell.desc: Rays hit subjects with variety of effects.

spell.name: Mass Invisibility
spell.desc: As invisibility, but affects all in range.

spell.name: Shadow Walk
spell.desc: Step into shadow to travel rapidly.

spell.name: Simulacrum
spell.desc: Creates partially real double of a creature.

spell.name: Control Undead
spell.desc: Undead dont attack you while under your command.

spell.name: Finger of Death
spell.desc: Kills one subject.

spell.name: Ethereal Jaunt
spell.desc: You become ethereal for 1 round/level.

spell.name: Plane Shift
spell.desc: Up to eight subjects travel to another plane.

spell.name: Reverse Gravity
spell.desc: Objects and creatures fall upward.

spell.name: Statue
spell.desc: Subject can become a statue at will.

spell.name: Teleport without Error
spell.desc: As teleport, but no off-target arrival.

spell.name: Vanish
spell.desc: As teleport, but affects a touched object.

spell.name: Limited Wish
spell.desc: Alters reality-within spell limits.

spell.name: Mind Blank
spell.desc: Subject is immune to mental/emotional magic and scrying.

spell.name: Prismatic Wall
spell.desc: Walls colors have array of effects.

spell.name: Protection from Spells
spell.desc: Confers +8 resistance bonus.

spell.name: Greater Planar Binding
spell.desc: As lesser planar binding, but up to 24 HD.

spell.name: Incendiary Cloud
spell.desc: Cloud deals 4d6 fire damage/round.

spell.name: Maze
spell.desc: Traps subject in extradimensional maze.

spell.name: Power Word, Blind
spell.desc: Blinds 200 hp worth of creatures.

spell.name: Summon Monster VIII
spell.desc: Calls outsider to fight for you.

spell.name: Trap the Soul
spell.desc: Imprisons subject within gem.

spell.name: Discern Location
spell.desc: Exact location of creature or object.

spell.name: Antipathy
spell.desc: Object or location affected by spell repels certain creatures.

spell.name: Binding
spell.desc: Array of techniques to imprison a creature.

spell.name: Demand
spell.desc: As sending, plus you can send suggestion.

spell.name: Mass Charm
spell.desc: As charm monster, but all within 30 ft.

spell.name: Ottos Irresistible Dance
spell.desc: Forces subject to dance.

spell.name: Sympathy
spell.desc: Object or location attracts certain creatures.

spell.name: Bigbys Clenched Fist
spell.desc: Large hand attacks your foes.

spell.name: Otilukes Telekinetic Sphere
spell.desc: As Otilukes resilient sphere, but you move sphere telekinetically.

spell.name: Sunburst
spell.desc: Blinds all within 10 ft., deals 3d6 damage.

spell.name: Screen
spell.desc: Illusion hides area from vision, scrying.

spell.name: Clone
spell.desc: Duplicate awakens when original dies.

spell.name: Horrid Wilting
spell.desc: Deals 1d8 damage/level within 30 ft.

spell.name: Etherealness
spell.desc: Travel to Ethereal Plane with companions.

spell.name: Iron Body
spell.desc: Your body becomes living iron.

spell.name: Polymorph Any Object
spell.desc: Changes any subject into anything else.

spell.name: Symbol
spell.desc: Triggered runes have array of effects.

spell.name: Freedom
spell.desc: Releases creature suffering imprisonment.

spell.name: Imprisonment
spell.desc: Entombs subject beneath the earth.

spell.name: Mordenkainens Disjunction
spell.desc: Dispels magic, disenchants magic items.

spell.name: Prismatic Sphere
spell.desc: As prismatic wall, but surrounds on all sides.

spell.name: Gate
spell.desc: Connects two planes for travel or summoning.

spell.name: Power Word, Kill
spell.desc: Kills one tough subject or many weak ones.

spell.name: Summon Monster IX
spell.desc: Calls outsider to fight for you.

spell.name: Foresight
spell.desc: Sixth sense warns of impending danger.

spell.name: Dominate Monster
spell.desc: As dominate person, but any creature.

spell.name: Bigbys Crushing Hand
spell.desc: As Bigbys interposing hand, but stronger.

spell.name: Meteor Swarm
spell.desc: Deals 24d6 fire damage, plus bursts.

spell.name: Weird
spell.desc: As phantasmal killer, but affects all within 30 ft.

spell.name: Astral Projection
spell.desc: Projects you and companions into Astral Plane.

spell.name: Energy Drain
spell.desc: Subject gains 2d4 negative levels.

spell.name: Soul Bind
spell.desc: Traps newly dead soul to prevent resurrection.

spell.name: Wail of the Banshee
spell.desc: Kills one creature/level.

spell.name: Refuge
spell.desc: Alters item to transport its possessor to you.

spell.name: Shapechange
spell.desc: Transforms you into any creature, and change forms once per round.

spell.name: Teleportation Circle
spell.desc: Circle teleports any creature inside to designated spot.

spell.name: Temporal Stasis
spell.desc: Puts subject into suspended animation.

spell.name: Time Stop
spell.desc: You act freely for 1d4+1 rounds.

spell.name: Wish
spell.desc: As limited wish, but with fewer limits.
